trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex*> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex*> property for navigation in wizard controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce dati per il <> </> *> proprietà e <> </> *> per la navigazione nei controlli di procedura guidata.

trans-unit.source: The WizardNavigationEventArgs class provides the data needed for the various navigation events in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control.
trans-unit.target: La classe WizardNavigationEventArgs fornisce i dati necessari per i vari eventi di navigazione in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick> event of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> control uses the WizardNavigationEventArgs object to indicate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>evento di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard>controllo utilizza l'oggetto WizardNavigationEventArgs per indicare il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A>per il controllo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.NextStepIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs.CurrentStepIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard.NextButtonClick>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardNavigationEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that is currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> oggetto attualmente visualizzato nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> dell'oggetto che il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controllo verrà visualizzato successivamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the navigation to the next step in the wizard should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se la navigazione al passaggio successivo della procedura guidata deve essere annullata.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the navigation to the next step should be canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la navigazione al passaggio successivo deve essere annullata. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> oggetto attualmente visualizzato nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that is currently displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Un valore di indice in base zero che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> oggetto attualmente visualizzato nel <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che rappresenta l'indice del <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> oggetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controllo verrà visualizzato successivamente.

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index value that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"></xref> object that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"></xref> control will display next.
trans-unit.target: Un valore di indice in base zero che rappresenta il <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WizardStep"> </xref> oggetto di <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Wizard"> </xref> controllo verrà visualizzato successivamente.
